invalidEmail: Invalid email format. Please enter a valid email address.
passwordBadLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
passwordOneLowerCase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
passwordOneUpperCase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passwordOneNumber: Password must contain at least one digit.
nameOneCharacter: Name must have at least two characters
passwordNoSpaces: The password can not contain spaces
passwordNotSpecial: Password can not contain special characters
